underlying_goal: Implement a verification step in reflect_all_menus() to confirm reflect buttons disappear after clicking, then test the full STEP 1-8 pipeline with a specific fortune-telling product configuration
friction_detail: The reflect_all_menus test reflected all 48 unprocessed items instead of just the 10 requested (.165-.174), the session/ppv_id patching workaround was fragile, and the registration modal failed with 'subtitle parse failed' requiring manual JS fixes that were still unresolved at session end.
brief_summary: User asked to implement a reflect-button disappearance verification step and test it; the code change was implemented and passed Codex review, but the test scope was wrong (48 items instead of 10), and the subsequent full pipeline test got stuck on a registration modal parse failure.
